CustomField.description: This field tracks if as a result of their grant from Global Fund for Women they received additional funding. (3) Yes, secured funding = the group clearly articulated that as a result of their GFW grant they were able to leverage it to secure additional funding from a donor; (2) Somewhat = they responded positively that the grant was helpful in this area but it was either unclear if they secured funding; (1) No mention = the group either stated "no" or there was no mention in the report or GFW feedback of leveraging the grant to secure additional funding
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field tracks if as a result of their grant from Global Fund for Women they received additional funding. (3) Yes, secured additional funding by leveraging their GFW grant; (2) Somewhat - grant was helpful; (3) No mention of leveraging the grant
CustomField.label: Resource mobilization
